article.title: ViaSat Awarded Limited Production Order For MIDS JTRS Terminals
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Navy's Space and Naval Warfare Systems Command has awarded ViaSat a limited production order valued at $14.4 million for 41 Multifunctional Information Distribution System Joint Tactical Radio System (MIDS JTRS) terminals. The terminals are for use in F/A-18E/F and E-8C Joint STARS aircraft and spares.
